hackWRF 0.4.7
  • Reference

Read and write metadata on a NetCDF file

Source: R/meta.R
meta.Rd

Read and write metadata information of a NetCDF files

meta(file = NA, var = 0, att = NA, action = "read", value = NA, verbose = F)

Arguments

file

file name

var

variable name, 0 to global and "?" to ask all names

att

attribute names (NA for get all attnames)

action

Read or write attribute, get return the value

value

value to write

verbose

display additional information

Examples

nc <- paste0(system.file("extdata",package="hackWRF"),"/small.nc")
meta(nc)
#> global attributes:
#> Title Author Creation Description Reference institution projection Conventions source
meta(nc,att = "Title")
#> global attribute Title:
#> Emissions
meta(nc,var = "?")
#> date so2 NO
meta(nc,var = "so2")
#> variable so2 attritutes:
#> units long_name standard_name molecular_weight molecular_weight_units
meta(nc,var = "so2",att = "long_name")
#> so2 attribute long_name:
#> so2 emissions
